name: Wright Flyer
description: The Wright Flyer is an adaptation of the classic Paper Plane cocktail, with a nod to North Carolina from its creator. Drew Furlough, a restaurant manager in Asheville, set out to build a citrusy winter cocktail on a base of apple brandy, a traditional spirit that’s enjoying a comeback in the Blue Ridge Mountains, where apples have been a major crop since the 1700s.
keywords: amaro, aperol, apple, apple brandy, applejack, grapefruit, grapefruit juice, rum, fall, winter
recipeIngredient: 6 dashes bitters, such as Angostura or apple
1 1/2 ounces Italian amaro, such as Nonino or Fernet-Branca
1/2 ounce dark rum, such as Gosling’s

recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker, combine sugar, bitters and applejack; shake to dissolve.
Fill shaker with ice and add grapefruit juice, amaro, Aperol and rum.
Shake well and strain into two coupe or martini glasses. Garnish each with an apple slice and serve immediately.
